_meta.description: Comprehensive content database for The Timeline of Tron — 22 years of life data extracted from LiveJournal posts, Message_for_Tron.md, and Timeline_of_Tron_By_The_Numbers.docx
_meta.author: J. Tronolone (wwecoowner)
_meta.enrichment_note: Enriched with data from all 30 LiveJournal posts (22 Timeline + 8 non-Timeline), scraped via 4 content agents and 3 comment agents. Covers 2004-2025.

project.title: The Timeline of Tron
project.format_evolution: Early years: classic diary-style 'JANUARY 1ST, 2005:' entries → Later years: tighter 'January 1 —' bullets with ℚ quote callouts and mini award/section breaks

person.name: John Tronolone
person.middle_school: Maple Place Middle School (class of 2004 reunion Aug 22, 2011)
person.came_out: 2008 (KMJ was 3rd person to know, at MarinaGrille in Brick NJ)
person.mother_birthday_note: Turned 82 on Apr 26, 2008 (implying born ~1926? Or age may refer to grandmother)
person.vehicle_sus15h: Multi-colored van; survived 3 flat tires in 2009; reached 190,000 miles Nov 2012; took 'last ride' Dec 2014
person.vehicle_kia_soul: Gray Kia Soul purchased Jan 2014 (initially white, changed via phone call for lower APR); hit 20,000 miles Dec 15, 2015
person.liberation_day: June 10, 2008 — relationship ended; celebrated 15th anniversary in 2023

career.title: EastCoastDodgeball Founder
career.milestone: Created ECD, organized 500+ participants over 5 years

career.title: Intern
career.milestone: Graduated Monmouth (3.66 major GPA, 3.49 cumulative). Inaugural HERO of the Year. Phillies PSA.

career.title: Life Enrichment Manager
career.milestone: Career at Sunrise begins (Oct 31/Nov 1). Left Ocean Township (Oct 13 notice).

career.title: Reminiscence Coordinator
career.milestone: Job offer Sep 28 (phone call in bathroom), started Oct 22. Previous: Escapades Producer ended Oct 19.

career.title: Assisted Living Manager
career.milestone: Applied May, started Sept 28. Brian announced departure same week.

career.title: Sr. Resident Care Coordinator
career.milestone: After competitive interview. Applied Jul 11, interviews Jul 19-21, accepted Jul 23.

career.title: Executive Director
career.milestone: Passed NJ certification exam — the top job

lifetime_stats.first_event_influence: Mrs. Amorino's VHS tapes at Holy Trinity Elementary — showed Ric Flair winning '92 Royal Rumble, Andre vs Hogan at WM III
lifetime_stats.phil_campanella: Biggest wrestling influence growing up; made being a fan 'the in thing' at Monmouth Regional HS

undertaker_moment.significance: Lifelong dream fulfilled, exact time documented to the second

milestones.label: Timeline Begins
milestones.note: Wrestling fandom started via Mrs. Amorino's VHS tapes at Holy Trinity Elementary

milestones.label: WrestleMania 23 in Detroit (3rd WM)
milestones.note: Ford Field, Hall of Fame, meet-and-greet

milestones.label: WrestleMania 25 in Houston (5th WM)
milestones.note: Stone Cold farewell salute, Undertaker 17-0. With Valerie Winston, Travis Mills, Ryan Letsche.

milestones.label: 62nd event overall (Hell In A Cell Oct 4)
Survivor Series at MSG (17,000+ attendance; The Rock returns)
milestones.note: Also RAW Holiday Tour at MSG Dec 27

milestones.label: WrestleMania 29 (at-home NJ; 8th WM); Event #75
milestones.note: 21-0 record. Five-star rating. Tim Moore visited.

milestones.label: WrestleMania XXX — Undertaker Handshake
milestones.note: New Orleans. Handshake at 4:10:18 PM CT. Streak broken 21-1. With Rob, Valerie, Tim.

milestones.label: WrestleMania 32 — 100K+ in building
milestones.note: 'Unquestionably, the greatest WWE experience of all-time'

milestones.label: WrestleMania 33; SummerSlam 20-year personal story complete
milestones.note: '1997, 2007, 2015, and now 2017. My personal SummerSlam story, some 20 years long, complete'

milestones.label: 91st event; 25th consecutive Survivor Series calendar year
Undertaker inducted into Hall of Fame

travel.highlight: 3 men, 3 women — Hard Rock Cafe, Monday Night RAW, Saturday Night Main Event
WrestleMania XXIV weekend — CityWalk, Universal Studios
FAB4 Year 2; 25th birthday at Renault Winery
HERO Campaign 10th Anniversary at Trump Taj Mahal
Annual ski trip with extended crew
First cruise ever. First cruise with RK. Sep 8-15. FIVE star rating.
Wedding weekend — 'Mar(r)yland'. Gave speech, danced 180 minutes.
Matt & Gina wedding. Manhattan Beach, Santa Monica, Malibu, Santa Barbara, Hollywood.
Profile Falls hike, Rattlesnake Trail, Jenny Sage barn, Harry the Pig
The best, the longest, and the greatest
Trip 1: Moore-Tronolone wedding (May 31-Jun 2). Trip 2: Green Bay/Lambeau Field 78,000+ (Sep 20-23).

travel.destination: Singapore, Thailand, Cambodia, Vietnam, Hong Kong
Grand Canyon, Vegas, Utah, Colorado, Boston

travel.highlight: Super Bowl LVII — 'the most spectacular day I've ever experienced'
4,000 miles — Mount Rushmore, Devils Tower, Gateway Arch, Badlands

travel_stats.total_cruises: 6 (2013-2018: Breakaway, Epic, USVI/Bahamas, Caribbean, Alaska, Mediterranean)

records.note: Regular player, multi-year. Best comeback: won from 0-6 down (2018). Match vs HH: 6-0, 6-3 (2022)
18,000 straight seconds (5 hours) with Angela Hibbert
4th jump Oct 3, 2020 — 'easiest of the freefalls', mother witnessed
Two consecutive 205 games on SkyDive day (Aug 16)
500+ participants organized over 5 years; 171 events attended before retirement (Jan 3, 2009)
vs Farnkopf: 6 hours 7 min 3 sec. 3 waters, 2 Vitamin Waters, 5 energy bars.
Championship won with Pops at Maggie & Mike's inaugural gathering (Aug 30)
Tartarugas squad formed May 25, 2010; Silver League Champions (Aug 30, 2017); broken left pinky ended volleyball career Mar 26, 2017

history.note: Music experiment with dance anthems; Lauren Stopa's 'Be My Lover' moment
DODGEBALL 90 with Tom Adams, Justin Pierce
Author's retirement from ECD after 40 months
Megill pied Wolf with cream-filled pie
DODGEBOWL 200 — era-ending extravaganza. Announced 9 months prior. FIVE star rating. Family attended. Emotional post-event ovation.
Chris & Joanice vs. Fitzpatrick & Stopa; backflip into Letsche salt water pool
7th Major championship. 2nd oldest winning captain. 214 total events. Defeated Kevin Fitzpatrick.
Team ALL triumphed at Major event. Megill captured Rimshot crown.

MU Intramural dodgeball league semi-final elimination (Nov 18, 2008)
ECD 'Immaculate Redemption' — Tronolone & Adams defeated Adams & Megill (Aug 14, 2010)
CREAMation Rules match on Undertaker's birthday (Mar 24, 2007)

music_artist_of_the_year.note: Top 2 three straight years; switched places with Madonna from 2012

song_of_the_year.note: Most nominations ever (tied with 2013). First time song from Timeline year won top honors.
Most nominations ever (tied with 2013). Janet's 'Alright' was runner-up (also runner-up in 2013).
First artist to win for two different songs in same year
Runners-up: Shawn Christopher 'Sweet Freedom', Jet 'Start The Show'. First time runner-up reached #1.

comedian_of_the_year.note: Two-time defending champion; later eliminated from competition
Second straight year; nominated every year since 2009

shocker_of_the_year.note: First time in Timeline history co-winners announced

other_awards.award: Videos of the Year: WrestleMania XXIV Intro and Ryan's Birthday Speech
Video of the Year: SkyDive I

comebacks.challenge: Life-altering car accident — panic attacks and anxiety
comebacks.comeback: Years-long recovery; became HERO of the Year advocate
Joined Jersey Shore Fitness with James Butler (Sep 2007); 'desperate lifestyle alteration'
Came out in 2008; began 'most rewarding and refreshing' months
Spinal microdiscectomy surgery (Dec 15). Post-surgery reflection: 'I Just Want To Wake Up. (I Did!)'
Mediterranean cruise + engagement ring by April — 4 months post-surgery
Gained 3 lbs solid muscle, biked to Highlands/Asbury Park/Sea Bright/Rumson/Deal
Continued travel (Norway, Iceland, Toronto, Montreal) & celebration

traditions.description: Core identity since before the Timelines began
Friend group activity evolved into community institution with WrestleMania-style names
Timeline posts drop early January, median date Jan 6-7
Personal voting tradition — Music Artist, Comedian, Best Laughs, Shocker of the Year
Evolved format feature in recent Timelines
Pre-WrestleMania party. 1st had 25 people (2007). Bowling involved. Annual.
Birthday (Sep 27) always celebrated across multiple days with different friend groups
4 jumps total: 2009 (solo with brother), 2009 (Cloud Nine group of 9), 2010, 2020 (mother witnessed)

broadway_entertainment.show: John Legend at Madison Square Garden
broadway_entertainment.note: First concert ever. India.Arie, Estelle, Buju Banton, Rick Ross, Kanye West also performed.

broadway_entertainment.show: O.A.R. at Monmouth University MAC Center
Carolina Panthers vs Giants at Giants Stadium
broadway_entertainment.note: Final game ever at old Giants Stadium. 78,809 attendance. 19th row center. Panthers won 41-9.
With Steve Pham and Juan Londono
Featured on Route 35 and NJ Turnpike billboards
First time at this event; attended with parents

broadway_entertainment.show: Weezer at Madison Square Garden (sold out)
U.S. Open: Nadal vs Medvedev final

2004: Life-altering car accident resulting in panic attacks and anxiety
2006: DODGEBALL 70 (Dec 30) — music experiment with dance anthems
FINS Friday gatherings ongoing since March 2006
2007: 27 bowling games in a single day
Started job at Ocean Township Recreation (Feb 27)
MU Co-Ed Dodgeball League championship (Nov 19, PondScum)
20+ hours of tennis in one week
2008: First semester of Health Studies completed at MU (May 8)
Diana DiBuccio: Comedian of the Year
Song of the Year: Tom Petty 'Runnin Down a Dream'
First beer shared with The Pops (Aug 21)
Car accident on West Park Avenue (Nov 4)
Came out in 2008; KMJ was 3rd person to know
2009: Retired from ECD after 171 events and 40 months (Jan 3)
SkyDive I at 10,000 feet (Aug 16) — 'maybe the happiest 24-span of my life'
First concert ever: John Legend at MSG with Kanye West (Aug 13)
Inducted into Eta Sigma Gamma at MU (Dec 16)
62nd WWE event (Hell In A Cell Oct 4)
28 beers consumed all year; 101 dates posted; 0 regrets
2010: Graduated Monmouth University (3.66 major GPA, 3.49 cumulative)
Won inaugural HERO of the Year (Jan 27)
Tennis match vs Farnkopf: 6 hours 7 minutes 3 seconds (Sep 21)
HERO Campaign 10th Anniversary at Trump Taj Mahal (Jul 22)
Brother Michael graduated from Kean University (May 13)
2011: First meal with Rob at Ocean Bay Diner (Jan 1)
Career at Sunrise Senior Living begins (Oct 31/Nov 1)
Survivor Series at MSG — The Rock returns (Nov 20)
Torn glenoid labrum confirmed via MRI (Aug 2)
2013: DODGEBOWL 200 — era-ending extravaganza (Aug 10, FIVE star rating)
Norwegian Breakaway — first cruise ever, first with RK (Sep 8-15, FIVE star rating)
Maryland wedding — gave speech, danced 180 minutes (Nov 7-9)
'2010 and 2013 will no doubt stand the test of time'
2014: Met The Undertaker at WM XXX (4:10:18 PM CT Apr 5)
Norwegian Epic cruise II — Jamaica, Grand Cayman, Cozumel (Dec 6-15)
Diana's 30th, Valerie's 30th, Pam's 30th, author's 30th — trend of 30s
Cornhole Championship won with Pops at Maggie & Mike's (Aug 30)
Johnny Nash: most influential friend of 2014
The Pops: Comedian of the Year (2nd straight year)
2015: Janet Jackson first Artist of the Year win
Dan Spengeman: Comedian of the Year
2016: Lauren Winston: Comedian of the Year
2017: L5-S1 herniation → microdiscectomy surgery (Dec 15) at Riverview hospital
California trip 600+ miles for Matt & Gina wedding
Broken left pinky — volleyball career paused (Mar 26)
2018: Mediterranean cruise (Slovenia, Italy, Greece, Malta, Croatia — 5 countries, 2 weeks)
Reminiscence Coordinator role at Sunrise of Wall (started Oct 22)
Best tennis comeback: won from 0-6 deficit (Dec 23)
Sisters turned 16 — Six Flags Great Adventure (Aug 27)
Won Weezer tickets as 94.3 radio 9th caller (Nov 26)
2019: Australia & New Zealand — 'the best, the longest, and the greatest' (19 days, Jan 12-31)
U.S. Open: Nadal vs Medvedev final, 3rd longest in 100+ years (Sep 8)
2020: Asian expedition: Singapore, Thailand, Cambodia, Vietnam, Hong Kong (17 days Jan-Feb)
Medical quarantine (Mar 26 – Apr 16) + muscle gain comeback
Assisted Living Manager at Sunrise of Jackson (started Sep 28)
4th skydive (Oct 3, mother witnessed) — 'easiest of the freefalls'
Pasta Passion & Pistols Murder Mystery NYE (Dec 31)
2021: 8.6 lbs shrimp + 7.3 lbs crab meat consumed
Jumped from Stratosphere in Las Vegas
Sr. Resident Care Coordinator promotion (applied Jul 11, accepted Jul 23)
20 years between Rangers games at MSG
Lauren Winston: Comedian of the Year
2022: Rangers playoff run (triple-OT game at MSG)
Undertaker inducted into Hall of Fame
2023: Super Bowl LVII in Phoenix — 'most spectacular day I've ever experienced'
Closed on house at Mill Creek Court (Dec 18)
Broadway: Hadestown, Aladdin, Chicago (3 shows in one year)
2024: Norway cruise (Alesund, Akureyri, Iceland Sky Lagoon)
2025: 4,000-mile Midwest road trip (16 states: Rushmore, Devils Tower, Gateway Arch, Badlands)
Five Boro Bike Tour medal finish

fun_facts: The exact time of meeting The Undertaker is recorded to the second: 4:10:18 PM CT
2010 year-end stats: 18 pounds gained, 3 alcoholic beverages consumed, 0 regrets
Consumed 8.6 lbs of jumbo shrimp and 7.3 lbs of lump crab meat at separate events (2021)
Waited 568 days for Laver Cup tennis championship tickets (2021)
Went 20 years between Rangers games at Madison Square Garden before returning (2021)
Escape room completed in exactly 45 minutes, 43 seconds
Played badminton for 18,000 straight seconds (5 hours) with Angela Hibbert
The Timeline project has outlasted LiveJournal's entire cultural relevance
East Coast Dodgeball events get WrestleMania-style names like 'Immaculate Redemption' and 'WrestleJohnMania XXVI'
First speeding ticket didn't come until September 14, 2011
WrestleMania 32 in Texas (2016) was called 'unquestionably, the greatest WWE experience of all-time'
Cornhole stats tracked with Major League precision: 254-98, 38 four-bag cornholios
The Kia Soul hit 20,000 miles on December 15, 2015 — of course this was noted
A ping pong match in 2021 went 218 individual rounds
27 bowling games in a single day (2007)
From spinal surgery in December to Mediterranean cruise with engagement ring by April (2017-2018)
Kevin & Leah's entire relationship arc documented from an outside perspective (2014-2020)
6 cornholios in one night streak (2016)
Rooney's restaurant visit generated '30 straight minutes of uncontrollable laughter' (2022)
Called someone 'a porcupine eater' by Mommy Kerr's daughter (2020)
Dropped $160 on assorted desserts for care team: 'job doesn't get easier unless yours does first' (2020)
Year 2021 self-rated 9.8 out of 10
CN Tower height: 1,815 feet (visited 2024)
First concert ever: John Legend at MSG with India.Arie, Estelle, Buju Banton, Rick Ross, and Kanye West (Aug 13, 2009)
55 emails sent in 4 hours 41 minutes to recover a missing final exam from a professor who disappeared (Dec 23, 2009)
SkyDive II 'Cloud Nine' had 9 participants: Tronolone, Smalls, Dennabuam, Canzanella, Letsche, Jacobs, Basista, Hoppe, Adams (Oct 11, 2009)
SUS15H (the van) survived 3 flat tires, spark plugs transplant, and muffler transplant in 2009 alone
Vehicle SUS15H reached 190,000 miles by November 2012

Only 3 alcoholic beverages consumed in all of 2010
Was the only male at Pilates class (2013)
Kept all anniversary receipts since 2012 (RK Year 2 dinner: Caesar salad, grilled swordfish, chicken scarpello)

Danced 180 minutes non-stop at Maryland wedding (Nov 7-9, 2013)
Played Batman at a friend's wedding (Nov 2, 2013): 'Joe & Gina! Table 7!'
7 consecutive bowling strikes but couldn't get the remaining 5 for a perfect game (Oct 22, 2013)
First haircut since May 2006 was gotten September 2, 2007 — roughly 16 months between haircuts
Contracted Shingles at age 20
Record 52 participants at DODGEBALL 100 (Aug 18, 2007)
WWE Stock purchased on December 12, 2007
50 dollars spent on 7 slices of cheese at a tasting (Jul 14, 2018)
Fishing trip with Captain 'Tight Lines' Tyler caught absolutely nothing (May 7, 2018)
Harry the Pig and Rocky the Dog encountered in New Hampshire (Sep 2018)
3,827 birthdays at Buck's celebration party (Jun 1, 2018)
Fever of 100.3 degrees on NYE 2018
6th cruise in 6 consecutive years by 2018
Engagement ring purchased in Croatia during Mediterranean cruise (Apr 2018)
$403 Butcher's Block dinner bill (Jul 31, 2019)
Lambeau Field visit with 78,000+ in attendance (Sep 2019)
Personal rebirth 'behind door 254' in Wisconsin (May 31-Jun 2, 2019)
Called 2009 'The Greatest Year Ever' — then 2013 contested it
The post title 'The Timline of Tron VI' has a deliberate/accidental typo in 'Timline' that was never corrected
Author's car 'SUS15H' was named with a vanity reference
Double wart removal surgery (Jan 22, 2008)
Fell from a pickup truck (May 21, 2011)
Earthquake experienced (Aug 23, 2011)
Blue work van hit a fence (Sep 15, 2011)

quotes.quote: I Just Want To Wake Up. (I Did!)
the best, the longest, and the greatest
the most spectacular day I've ever experienced
unquestionably, the greatest WWE experience of all-time
not a death sentence, living proof
it's called dedication. look it up.
the notebook doesn't lie, ValPal.
you're welcome for the immortality.
job doesn't get easier unless yours does first
quotes.context: After dropping $160 on desserts for care team, 2020

quotes.quote: the record is the record. next question.
the committee has spoken, Darrell.
quotes.context: To The Pops about Comedian of the Year

quotes.quote: Without any hesitation, I proudly proclaim that 2007 was undoubtedly the most colorful and eventful year of my life.
Conquered obstacles, dreams turned reality, fears for happy tears
2008: Rewarding, Refreshing, Heavenly. I Did It.
Family First...Friendship takes two, not one.
Sometimes it is hell trying to get to heaven.
You cannot fear death once you've touched heaven.
Walk the plank, take the jump, and still come up alive. What's a chance if you don't take it.
Friends, Family, Freedom. The Greatest Year Ever. 2009.
0 = Regrets
In love, and unashamed by it and for whom it's for
the beauty in finality. The wonder of commencement.
the best + the most = .TWENTY '13.
If all keeps up, 2013 could honestly become the greatest year of my adulthood
just woke up from this dream.. but it wasn't a dream!!!
2010 and 2013 will no doubt stand the test of time. The only difference is that now, in '13, I've had someone to share all those amazing times.
All that keeps running through my head is 'I finally did it.' I never, ever thought the day would come.
It wasn't something I was happy about doing, but it is something I'm happy I did.
1997, 2007, 2015, and now 2017. My personal SummerSlam story, some 20 years long, complete.
THE GREAT ADVENTURE 2.0.1.7
patience & gratitude
What am I getting myself into?
Halfway to 70
best. longest. most. greatest.
2020, challenge accepted
My friends got their ladies, they're all having babies, but I just want to have some fun.
Life went from 9.5 to 9.7 in 10m, 37s
Baby is here. Everyone healthy and safe.
I said exactly what I needed to say; now I look back with a smile.
quotes.context: About coming out, from Merrie Melodies post

quotes.quote: He simply made being a wrestling fan acceptable, the 'in' thing.
quotes.context: About Phil Campanella, from The Influlist

quotes.quote: the beginning not of a temporary diet, but a desperate lifestyle alteration
quotes.context: About starting fitness with James Butler, Sep 2007

yearly_timelines._note: All posts on wwecoowner.livejournal.com. Timeline posts are annual recaps; non-Timeline posts are thematic entries.

non_timeline_posts.description: Allegorical post about emotional crisis around birthday; metaphorical 'open heart surgery'

non_timeline_posts.title: Merrie Melodies (Part I)

lj_comments._note: Comments scraped from LiveJournal posts. Commenters include friends, family, professors, and strangers.
lj_comments._status: Partial scrape completed — comment data saved separately in lj_comments_data.json

common_themes: Requests to appear in next Timeline

sample_comments.excerpt: You deserve a prize for being the last person on livejournal
JTP only you would call 2020 great
Shit I need to do this. It's so cool
So energizing to sense the energy you bring to life
oh my gosh! i am so honored to have made multiple appearances!
you reminded me of a LOT of events that i have forgotten about
Well written, John, but as usual, makes little sense to me. You are way too esoteric.
When Jim Butler calls you esoteric, well...that's just hilarious (pot, meet kettle)

medical_history.event: Life-altering car accident — panic attacks and anxiety
Near-anorexia and mental health crisis; chopped long hair; joined gym
Car accident — rear-ended on West Park Avenue (Nov 4)
Slightly torn glenoid labrum (right shoulder, confirmed via MRI Aug 2)
Left pinky dislocation + two-part fracture from volleyball (Mar 26)
Two epidural injections (Nov 10, Dec 8 — second failed)
Microdiscectomy surgery at Riverview hospital (Dec 15); 14 staples removed Dec 26
Medical quarantine (Mar 26 – Apr 16); gained 3 lbs solid muscle
